definition: letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random

sentences.english: Company to the quality and reputation-based, customer demand is our goal.
sentences.chinese: 公司以质量与信誉为本，客户的需求是我们的目标。

sentences.english: Einsun jumps to the first place in credit in the comprehensive test for the amount of annual examination in Southwest China.
sentences.chinese: 爱因森国际综合考场年考量考试信誉度跃居西南第一。

sentences.english: It is greatly welcomed with a mass of enterprises and has built up a good company credit standing within and outside food industry.
sentences.chinese: 深受广大企业的青睐，在业内外享有良好的企业信誉。

sentences.english: Quality is the base of Market, Goodwill erected by fervid service.
sentences.chinese: 以质量拓展市场，热情服务树信誉。

sentences.english: Beijing area as one of the foreign trade companies, we have a good reputation.
sentences.chinese: 作为北京地区的外贸公司之一，我们有着良好的信誉。

sentences.english: Leading Chinese goods on the image and credibility has not high.
sentences.chinese: 导致中国商品的形象和信誉一直不高。

sentences.english: System wised, to make it a whole again and to restore trust.
sentences.chinese: 要明智决策，重新整合体系，重建信誉。

sentences.english: Jinjiufu keeps its promise of faith and is as sincere as gold to its partners.
sentences.chinese: 金九福对信誉一诺千金，对客户及合作伙伴赤诚如金。

sentences.english: Beneficiary means the party in whose favour a credit is issued.
sentences.chinese: 蒙害己意指信誉证外受害的一圆。

sentences.english: Don't believe any fly-by-night company, they all lack credibility.
sentences.chinese: 皮包公司的信誉值得我们相信吗？

sentences.english: For a start he can make sure that his customer is credit-worthy.
sentences.chinese: 首先，要确保他的客户具有良好的信誉。

sentences.english: Diagnosis and treatment of gynecological diseases in the plot is rich in clinical experience, credibility is quite patient and his family.
sentences.chinese: 在妇科病诊治中积有丰富临床经验，颇受病家信誉。

sentences.english: Better reputation, innovation, excellence, to achieve hundred percent pass rate.
sentences.chinese: 更佳的信誉，创新，创优，实现出厂合格率百分百。

sentences.english: But the episode did lasting harm to the credibility of its macroeconomic stewardship.
sentences.chinese: 但是那件事却对政府的宏观调控信誉产生了持久伤害。

sentences.english: That woman is wanted in 5 states for credit-card fraud.
sentences.chinese: 那位妇女因信誉卡讹诈而被5个州通缉。

definition: to trust/to have confidence in/to have faith in/to rely on
